publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-295.1 Fiona McLeod: Digital Scotland Initiative—As an amendment to motion (S1M-295) in the name of Peter Peacock, delete from "help develop" to end and insert "produce an Integrated Information Strategy for Scotland which aims to influence the global development of the information society, ensures the development of an information society at national level and supports regional and local information society development in Scotland, which ensures the implementation of the strategy in and across every sphere and sector of Scottish society, and which will produce a National Action Plan in line with the European Commission’s Information Society Action Plan that addresses the priority areas for action and has a clear timetable for achievement and progress." Supported by: Michael Russell*, Alasdair Morgan*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Linda Fabiani*
